body:
Do somebody use this a function? I want to use. I love this function.
But, who tested it? I've just tried to use but I can't. First - We can't to click on a link. Second - The UI like "doesn't matter what I'll show".
Please, can we open the issue and fix it?

Thanks.
@asamats did you configure it as described?

@samdark Yes, I did. I configured my OS. From debug toolbar, I can open my IDE. From the error log, I also can but it's not easy because the link looks so strange (Chrome). Yes, if we look at the HTML code it looks correct.
![screenshot](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3476245/53109996-24ef6980-354b-11e9-9677-c40d57d6b82e.png)
1) Files should go one by one.
2) Links must be clickable.
